column5: I fish at least once a week in local Northwestern Ontario lakes for bass and walleye. Outside of that, my and my 5 kids fish almost every day from shore in Rainy river, manitou rapids to be more specific.  Here are some pics from are great times this past year. I have tons. lol, so I'll just add a few at a time.  Please feel free to add your 201o family fishing pics as well, I'd love to see them.  A family that fishes together, stays together (and gives wifey some much needed relaxation time!lol)  Here is a 4lber caught a few weeks ago by my 7 year old son, he's an awesome angler. I wish I was that good at such a young age! This fish was held in the live well for 115 minutes while we went home to get the camera I forgot, then released back into the river after the pic
Some evening bass fishing, I caught my son off gaurd in the pic, haha, great expression
last January, 31 inch walleye through the ice on a pink jig and minnow  Just a tad over 10lbs

nice pics natron,  I Wish I had the luxury you have to fish such great waters on a daily basis....and good for you in getting your kids hooked on fishing. they will enjoy it for the rest of their lives.
Some very impressive fish you and your son have there natron, your gonna fit into this fish'n board very nicely !!
Hey John, that little chippie was looking for Brent last week
Yeah I took a little license with the dates............lol..

awesome pics John!  I love fishing with my kids. I try to teach them everything I know, and their just little spunges, they remember it all.  My 7 year old boy is the master outta the kids though, I don't know of anyone else that age that knows as many techniques as him, and can fish shallows from shore virtually snag free.  When we fish, we do all sorts of other stuff as well, hunt crawfish and frogs, have bonfires and picknicks etc. They certainly love fishing, and love the outdoors as well.  Next summer my son will be fishing in the 2011 Fort Frances Bass Championships mini angler/pro compitition, hes pumped for that already, lol
Me & my 10 yr old GrSon had a great day on the water lasy week
I literally have 100's of pics of the family fishing with me from this year. Here are a few
a nice storm brewing on Lake of the Woods a few weeks back
My wife caught her personal best walleye this year on are week long vacation on quinte !! Heres a picture of her with a 3.3 and a 4.5 lb walleye !
here is the family ogre that I have enjoyed fishing with this year. ( my daughter has been away EVERY weekend this summer   )
My 8 yr old isn't to keen on fishing...But he did get to land his biggest fish this past July!
My five year old great-grandson Ryan James a couple of weeks ago...  Oh my...would his grandmother be proud of him if she were still with us...
awesome pics everyone  always glad to see families having fun together  Here is another of my 7 year old sons smallies this summer, caught off shore in Manitou on Rainy River

another lunker.  just FYI, this fish was mounted by his grandfather for his bar. He's a status indian, if there are any complaints about the size and keeping it, lol.  This is one of two bass we actually kept this year
5 years old and already tying baits!
Great photo Dax, cute guy, must take after his Mom!
I've posted these before but here's my favorite pics of my daughter's catch  Her very first bass at age 5    First speckle    and last year's ice fishing and a 14" perch    Leechman
